constituent: sew, thread, spiderman, tryst, Segway, Macbeth, walking legs, bushes, road
koohiiStory1: Pointy primitive; with a pointy needle you sew a road (-------) of threads.
koohiiStory2: Good thing I brought some thread, cause I need to sew my pants that I tore up walking through the bushes (see summit (#1562)) before we hit the road to go back down the mountain.
